attributes.action: Call a general election in the event of the current Primeminister resigning or passing away.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the country votes for a new Government, most vote because of there admiration for the person in charge of that party. Whatever our political persuasion we all like and dislike individual members of a political party. Therefore when a Prime Minister resigns, passes away etc. surely a general election should be called so that the country may decide who will be Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
